sentences.cn: 即使他的亵渎行为也缺乏想象力.

sentences.en: He promised to abstain from smoking, chewing, and profanity as long as he remained a member.
sentences.cn: 他答应戒掉吸烟, 嚼烟, 渎烟,一日当着会员,一日不破戒.

sentences.en: In matter of profanity he was sublime.
sentences.cn: 以亵渎神圣的言行而论,他是首屈一指的.

sentences.en: In the matter of profanity he was sublime.
sentences.cn: 他破口乱骂的本领,也是卓越非凡的.
请注意你的脏话, 预科生.

sentences.en: Rory : Excuse me, but we don't tolerate profanity.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 但是我们不能容忍亵渎.

sentences.en: That gentleman disliked coarseness and profanity.
sentences.cn: 那位先生一向忌讳粗俗和猥亵.

sentences.en: The comedian delivered a profanity - laced monologue.
sentences.cn: 那名喜剧演员来了段出口成[脏]的长篇大论.

sentences.en: The TVGuardian automatically detects and filters profanity and other offensive phrases.
sentences.cn: 电视卫士自动检查和过滤侮辱性词语和其他有攻击性的语言.

sentences.en: Then Hewlett Janders stormed over , big , robust full of action and profanity.
sentences.cn: 体利特·詹德尔斯冲了进来, 还是精神抖擞, 满口亵渎神明.

sentences.en: They use a little profanity sometimes.
To desecrate a holy spring is considered profanity.
sentences.cn: 圣泉俗用被认为是亵渎神灵的行为。

sentences.en: We'll be offering bonuses for most creative use of profanity.
sentences.cn: 我们会给使用最有创意的使用亵渎词语的员工发奖金.

sentences.en: You can turn your pain into profanity - or into poetry.
sentences.cn: 你可以把你的痛苦到亵渎或入诗.

sentences.en: You no longer spout profanity when talking about sitting while drunk.
sentences.cn: 当你喝醉坐下说话的时候将不能口出秽言.

trans.tran_en: offensive words or religious words used in a way that shows you do not respect God or holy things
